titles.title: To amend the Federal Reserve Act to revise the membership of Federal Open Market Committee, and for other purposes.
FOMC Representation Improvement Act
FOMC Representation Improvement Act
FOMC Representation Improvement Act

action.text: Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Monetary Policy and Trade Prior to Referral.
Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary:
FOMC Representation Improvement Act
This bill amends the Federal Reserve Act to revise the membership of the Federal Open Market Committee.
